fields.description:
This is not a regression. It is occurring on 2.1.2 also. 
This seems to be iOS 6 device issue. Working fine on iOS 6 simulator and iOS 5 device.

Steps to reproduce :
1. Launch KitchenSink
2. Go to "Base UI"- "Views"
3. Tap on "Events Propagation" 

Expected Result:
Should be able to see window with 4 views(A,B,C,D)

Actual Result:
App crashes.Crash logs are attached.
fields.summary: Kitchen sink:Base UI:Views:Events Propagation leading to app crash.
